name: Interstellar Expedition
description:
Interstellar Expedition is a futuristic side-scrolling shooter game, where players can control their spacecraft using the mouse and engage in thrilling space battles. In the game, players can choose from a variety of different types of spacecraft, each with unique weapons and special abilities, to suit their play style and combat needs.

The game takes place in various environments in the future interstellar space, including asteroid belts, star systems, and battlefields. Players can fly freely in these environments, evade enemy attacks, and search for targets to attack. The game features multiple types of enemies, each with unique attack styles and special abilities, requiring players to use different strategies to defeat them.

The game's controls are simple and easy to understand, with players using the mouse to control their spacecraft's flight direction and attack method. The game's graphics are exquisite and detailed, full of futuristic technology, coupled with smooth sound effects and music, allowing players to enjoy an immersive audiovisual experience.
